system.effect: Target - Trainers or Pokémon\nOnce Arena trap is activated, all foes within 5 meters of the user are considered Slowed. This does not affect targets of the Flying Type, or with a Levitate, Sky, or Burrow Speed of 4 or higher. The user may end the effect as a Free Action, and the effect ends if the user is fainted or returned to a Poké Ball.
